name: account
description: in here all accounts are saved

not_null_keys.name: password_hash
not_null_keys.description: hash of the password of the account

not_null_keys.name: password_salt
not_null_keys.description: salt for hashing the password of the account

not_null_keys.name: is_admin
not_null_keys.description: indicates if account has elevated admin rights

not_null_keys.name: is_private
not_null_keys.description: indicates if account should be hidden on public page

not_null_keys.name: is_banned_comments
not_null_keys.description: indicates if account is banned in writing comments

not_null_keys.name: is_banned_entries
not_null_keys.description: indicates if account is banned in creating new (playlist) entries

null_keys.name: name
null_keys.description: real name of account

null_keys.name: server_file_path_profile_picture
null_keys.description: server file path to profile picture of account

null_keys.name: status
null_keys.description: account status text

name: artist
description: in here all artist are saved

null_keys.name: description
null_keys.description: more information about the artist

null_keys.name: server_file_path_artist_picture
null_keys.description: server file path to a 'profile' picture of the artist

null_keys.name: link_spotify
null_keys.description: link to the Spotify account of the artist

null_keys.name: link_youtube
null_keys.description: link to the YouTube account of the artist

name: song_content_type
description: the type of content in the song file (lyric video, music video, audio file, ...)

not_null_keys.name: name
not_null_keys.description: name of the type of content in the song file

not_null_keys.name: date
not_null_keys.description: date when song content type was added

not_null_keys.name: author
not_null_keys.description: account that added the song content type

null_keys.name: description
null_keys.description: more information about the song content type

not_null_keys.name: date
not_null_keys.description: date when song language was added

not_null_keys.name: author
not_null_keys.description: account that added the song language

name: song
description: in here all songs are saved

not_null_keys.name: server_file_path
not_null_keys.description: server file path to song file

null_keys.name: release_date
null_keys.description: date of the release of the song

null_keys.name: description
null_keys.description: more information about the song

null_keys.name: lyrics
null_keys.description: lyrics of the song

null_keys.name: local_file_path
null_keys.description: local file path to song file

null_keys.name: song_content_type
null_keys.description: song content type (Music video, audio file, ...)

null_keys.name: song_content_language
null_keys.description: language of the song

null_keys.name: link_spotify
null_keys.description: link to song on Spotify

null_keys.name: link_youtube
null_keys.description: link to song on YouTube

name: song_tag_artist
description: in here artists are connected to songs they sing

not_null_keys.name: song
not_null_keys.description: song which the connected artist is in

not_null_keys.name: artist
not_null_keys.description: artist which sings the connected song

name: playlist_entry
description: playlist entry of song where accounts can join as singer

not_null_keys.name: author
not_null_keys.description: account that created the playlist entry

not_null_keys.name: song
not_null_keys.description: song that was added to the playlist entry

name: playlist_entry_singer
description: account that wants to join a song in the connected playlist entry

not_null_keys.name: date
not_null_keys.description: date when join to playlist_entry was added

not_null_keys.name: playlist_entry
not_null_keys.description: playlist entry that the author account wants to join

not_null_keys.name: author
not_null_keys.description: account that created the playlist entry join

name: image_album
description: in here image collections are saved

null_keys.name: name
null_keys.description: name of the image

null_keys.name: description
null_keys.description: description of the image

name: image_tag_song
description: indicates that a song was played while an image was taken

not_null_keys.name: image
not_null_keys.description: image that was taken during a song

not_null_keys.name: song
not_null_keys.description: song that was played while taking this image

name: image_tag_account
description: indicates that an account is in the image

not_null_keys.name: image
not_null_keys.description: image that was taken during a song

not_null_keys.name: account
not_null_keys.description: account that is in the picture

not_null_keys.name: author
not_null_keys.description: account that added tagged this image

name: artist_comment
description: a comment on the page of an artist

not_null_keys.name: artist
not_null_keys.description: artist page on which the comment was made

null_keys.name: reply
null_keys.description: this comment was an answer to another comment

name: song_comment
description: a comment on the page of a song

not_null_keys.name: song
not_null_keys.description: song page on which the comment was made

null_keys.name: reply
null_keys.description: this comment was an answer to another comment

name: account_comment
description: a comment on the page of an account

not_null_keys.name: account
not_null_keys.description: account page on which the comment was made

null_keys.name: reply
null_keys.description: this comment was an answer to another comment

name: playlist_entry_comment
description: a comment on a playlist entry

not_null_keys.description: playlist_entry on which the comment was made

null_keys.name: reply
null_keys.description: this comment was an answer to another comment

not_null_keys.name: image
not_null_keys.description: image on which the comment was made

null_keys.name: reply
null_keys.description: this comment was an answer to another comment

not_null_keys.name: album
